*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ellis H. Bean to Austin, July 5, 1826. Advising Austin to evade constitutional liberation of slaves by converting them into indented servants.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-05-1826">July the 5th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dier SIR,*/p*
*p*I have not the honor of Being aquented with [you] But I think it my Duty to enform you as a *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*that I Recivd a letter from *location_mentioned*Saltilla */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-04-1826">yesterday */date_mentioned*that states that the law will undoubtedly pess that all the *person_mentioned*Negros */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*Provens of Texas and Quaguila*/location_mentioned* will [be] set free in this case I spoke to the *person_mentioned*Presedent */person_mentioned*as he is an old *person_mentioned*frind */person_mentioned*of mine he states me the same But there is a way your *person_mentioned*Settlers */person_mentioned*can Stop it all But the sooner the Better that is to Gow in Presens of and *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*stating that this *person_mentioned*nigro */person_mentioned*cost you so much and when he Pays it by labor Don you have no charge against him he Discounts so much a month as any other *person_mentioned*hirid Persons*/person_mentioned* a small sum so that he will be the same to you as Before and it will be no more notised this you will comunicate to the *person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*on the *location_mentioned*Ais bayo*/location_mentioned* so that they can take the same Measurs with thers it is ennabatebel [inevitable] necesario as quick as Posibel—*/p*
*p*I have nothin in this worth your atension Please enform the *person_mentioned*widow long*/person_mentioned* that it is imposibel that this government will alow hir any Penchen as hir *person_mentioned*husband */person_mentioned*was not nown as a *person_mentioned*General */person_mentioned*on this Piase nor had no comisión from this Gverment—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Ellis H Bean*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
